ProductInfo.Features:
Aluminum housing for indoor outdoor application. Built-in light sensor controls IR activation
Affordable day night audio video CMOS security camera. NTSC signal system
36 IR illuminators for night vision. Horizontal Resolution: 520 TV lines. Lens: 6.0mm
Built-in audio microphone and built-in mechanical IR-Cut filter switch
Package included: 8 of CMOS cameras, 2 of 4 channel power supplies and 8 of security warning decals
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 8 Day Night Vision Infrared Outdoor Audio Bullet Security Cameras IR-Cut Filter Built-in Microphone for CCTV DVR Home Surveillance System with 2 of 4 Channel Power Supplies and Bonus Security Warning Stickers CC8
